author: Aaron Schultz
quote: My cube has created such a positive energy throughout the home. It's great to sit with it in meditation or to just simply relax.

author: Jen Rubenstein
quote: An incredibly warm, welcoming, and healing environment has been created by Rachel and Megan. I have been 4 times and hope to do an overnight soon; so far I feel rejuvenated and more centered with each 2 hour session. I trust this is an integral part of my healing journey and will continue to come for sessions. I cannot imagine a more professional, caring, or accommodating atmosphere. I look forward to continued healing!

author: Jacqueline Nolan
quote: I initially did a 2hr session and an overnight. I felt completely relaxed, rejuvenated and more mentally clear than I had been in a long time. I had a lot going on when I started coming and the EE sessions helped me focus, and after my first overnight session my thinking was so clear, I knew the direction I should go in regarding a situation. I love my sessions and would recommend it as a way of disconnecting from the outside world and reconnecting with your inner self.

author: Polly
quote: I came to The Recharge Room to support my overall health and reduce stress. Since starting sessions, I sleep better, feel more energized, and haven't gotten sick once. The peaceful space make it an amazing experience. I leave every session feeling refreshed and balanced. Highly recommend!

author: Rita Willing
quote: I visited Battersea park clinic, very nice staff, my first visit I received 2 hours of EE treatment. Afterwards I felt relaxed and energised.

author: Joanna Lee
quote: Just had 6 hours of the EES over 3 days. It gives such a wonderful sense of wellbeing. The usual inflammatory pain I have in my back and neck has gone! The owners are lovely people too. I think this is the future of healthcare.

author: Maryluz Leek
quote: What a wonderful experience I had at Flowmotion Energy Center in Hilversum! I attended an EE session there. Lie down for 2 hours and not have to do anything else. The welcome was friendly and warm. Starting with a cup of tea and a good explanation of how the EE session would work. After the session I experienced a lot of relaxation in my body and in my head. Highly recommended if you really want to relax.

author: April Werla
quote: Brian and I went to Healthy Body Healthy Soul LA this weekend... Yesterday, Brian and I snuggled on the couch and I was leaning on his right shoulder (the one he doesn't like anything to touch and doesn't want to move.) NO issues.

author: Corinne
quote: Fabulous experience, invited to discover Pure Vitality, I did a rejuvenating bath during the 2 hours: calm, softness, more energy, more aligned since then, a clear state of mind, detox of the body... I highly recommend. Looking forward to experiencing other immersions!
